data.text: @AlexMunter @CHEO You look like a bunch of medical luddites
@AlexMunter @CHEO Funny, you never posted this crap for RSV. #CovidTheater kills teenagers. #Suicides are up. #EatingDisorders are up.

@LiaDePauw @AlexMunter @CHEO @CHCOntario Actually the handicapped need to read faces! I have done this work for a decade. I have been a very versed in this field.  Not to mention the air is hindered for them too. Many have issues with breathing already. Maybe live in a group home instead of make statesment.
@LisaWadden @AlexMunter @CHEO I have worked in the field for years.  Very special group. So stop handicapping them more and smile!! Left this industry for a reason.
@AlexMunter @CHEO So when you’re advocating masking all school children (a total flip flop from this fall) how does nearly 60% of kids already being immune play into it? https://t.co/g86Ex3qgw0…
@Chriszakura @LiaDePauw @AlexMunter @CHEO @CHCOntario So every generation before covid never learned to be caring citizens? Stupid comment!
@AlexMunter @CHEO Thank you for thinking about our kids with medical complexity and disabilities. We often feel forgotten in discussions about people being “done with COVID”.
